name: Orbs: Light vs Darkness
description:
Work-In-Progress game

My goal is to complete the game I started during the CGDC Speedgame 2021: Hardmode. Game will be updated until I find it is complete enough.

To Play:

WASD + Mouse to move and rotate camera

Gamepad: Left and Right Analog sticks to move and rotate camera

Goal:

Go around the maze picking up orbs of light from the light emitters before they disappear into the black holes. There are 7 emitters in total, once they are gone, if there aren't enough orbs left that's game over! Bring 70 orbs to the beacon in the center of the maze and you win!
